analysis.description:
Sale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/3/0x3adfc4999f77d04c8341bac5f3a76f58dff5b37a.sol#518-522) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0x3adfc4999f77d04c8341bac5f3a76f58dff5b37a.sol#521-522)

	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender) > 0) (/unique_chucks/3/0x3adfc4999f77d04c8341bac5f3a76f58dff5b37a.sol#537-539)

	- etherBalances (/unique_chucks/3/0x3adfc4999f77d04c8341bac5f3a76f58dff5b37a.sol#541-542)
